text: Once you reach the limits of Figma, it’s time to move on. Discover 3 hacks to enhance interactions with real-time validations, dynamic error messages powered with data, and squishy animated unicorns.Before diving into Protopie and Lottie, let’s talk about our beloved friend Figma. The tool is great for 99% of our daily design needs, whether you’re crafting UI, hosting brainstorming sessions in Figjam, or even setting a nice-looking press with the new Figma Slides features. Not to mention all the AI madness that turns Figma even more overkill.Prototyping with Figma is top-notch too. With variables and expressions, we can go deeper into logic-driven design and craft accurate interactions. Figma’s new UI3 also enhances the use of “if/else” expressions and set values in “variables” clearly and efficiently. I would suggest you first read my previous articles if you want to know a little more about advanced prototyping with this tool.
html:
Once you reach the limits of Figma, it’s time to move on. Discover 3 hacks to enhance interactions with real-time validations, dynamic error messages powered with data, and squishy animated unicorns.

Before diving into Protopie and Lottie, let’s talk about our beloved friend Figma. The tool is great for 99% of our daily design needs, whether you’re crafting UI, hosting brainstorming sessions in Figjam, or even setting a nice-looking press with the new Figma Slides features. Not to mention all the AI madness that turns Figma even more overkill.

Prototyping with Figma is top-notch too. With variables and expressions, we can go deeper into logic-driven design and craft accurate interactions. Figma’s new UI3 also enhances the use of “if/else” expressions and set values in “variables” clearly and efficiently. I would suggest you first read my previous articles if you want to know a little more about advanced prototyping with this tool.
